value.title: Quickly create Power BI reports in Power BI Service
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session to demonstrate the new feature which is just been rolled out by Microsoft. Now, we can quickly create reports using the Power BI Service itself. We don’t need to open the Power BI Desktop for the same. This new feature is being rolled out from December 2020 Power BI
